entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
